Title: Artificial Shoulder Mount
Description: User can mount 2 Cyberarms under first set of arms.

Title: Borgware Hardened Shielding
Description: Protect a single piece of Borgware against EMP effects

Title: Bug Eye
Description: An oversized Cybereye resembling the bulging eyeball of an insect. Contains 5 slots for Cybereye options

Title: Modular Finger Enthusiast Cyberhand
Description: Eight fingers. No waiting

Title: Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame
Description: Makes you strong & stealthy. Lots of blades

Title: Implanted Linear Frame Σ
Description: Enhanced skeleton and support structure. Increases BODY to 12. The increase changes HP, Wound Threshold, and Death Save. Requires BODY 6 and Grafted Muscle and Bone Lace.

Title: Implanted Linear Frame β
Description: Enhanced skeleton and support structure. Increases BODY to 14. The increase changes HP, Wound Threshold, and Death Save. Requires BODY 8 and 2 Grafted Muscle and Bone Lace.

Title: Linear Frame Ω, Internal
Description: A perfected cybernetic endoskeleton enhanced further by hydraulic and myomar muscles.

Title: MonoVision
Description: Doesn't let you shoot optic blasts. Does let you install Cybereye options without pairing.

Title: LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame
Description: Good for swimming, climbing, and beating people

Title: MultiOptic Mount
Description: User can mount up to 5 additional Cybereyes.

Title: Sensor Array
Description: User can install up to 5 additional Cyberaudio Options. Requires Cyberaudio Suite but does not take up any Cyberaudio Option Slot.

Title: Vermillion Linear Frame
Description: Jump high. Go fast. Be strong

Title: RealSkinn™
Description: Artificial skin coating for Cyberlimb. Requires a Cyberarm or Cyberleg but does not take an Option Slot.

Title: Sponsored Covering
Description: Covers the Cyberarm in an illustrated advertisement. Assuming the user remains in good standing with the sponsor and displays the arm uncovered for a percentage of the day, they receive 20eb on the first of each month. Sponsors have been known to repossess the entire arm if the wearer breaks the terms of their conditions. Requires a Cyberarm.

Title: Big Knucks
Description: Armored knuckles. Medium Melee Weapon. Can be concealed. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm.

Title: ChainRipp
Description: A retractable chainsaw built into your arm.

Title: Cyberarm
Description: Replacement arm. Has 4 Option Slots. Comes installed with Standard Hand that doesn't cause Humanity Loss or take up an Option Slot.

Title: Gang Jazzler
Description: Enough electricity flowing through your finger to stun an elephant. If they haven't gone extinct.

Title: Cyberpillow
Description: Provides no benefit other than making it easier to take a nap wherever you want. Requires a Cyberarm.

Title: Integrated Cyberscanner
Description: Cyberscanner installed in Cyberarm. Requires a Cyberarm

Title: Modular Finger Enthusiast Cyberhand
Description: Eight fingers. No waiting

Title: Extra-Jointed Cyberlimb Upgrade
Description: Adds extra points of articulation. +2 bonus to Contortionist Skill Checks

Title: Flashbulb
Description: Blind your enemies with your arm

Title: Grapple Hand
Description: Fires hand, along with a grapple line up to 30m/yds. Requires a Cyberarm.

Title: Holo Projector Palm
Description: A hologram projector built into the user's palm. Can output a potentially interactive holographic projection roughly the size of a soda can when linked to an Agent. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm.

Title: Integrated Cyberdeck Upgrade
Description: An additional slot for your arm-mounted Cyberdeck

Title: Medscanner
Description: Medscanner installed in Cyberarm. Helps diagnose illness and injury. +2 to First Aid and Paramedic. Requires a Cyberarm and takes 2 Option Slots.

Title: Modular Finger Cyberhand
Description: A hand for modular Cyberfingers

Title: Neo-Soviet Cyberarm
Description: Neo-Soviet charm for your Cyberarm

Title: PersonalPak KibbleWarmer
Description: Small cylindrical rotisserie oven installed in the forearm, sized to fit a PersonalPak Kibble cylinder and warm it to exactly the right toasty temperature for crispy enjoyment. Requires a Cyberarm.

Title: Popup Grenade Launcher
Description: A single-shot Grenade Launcher installed in a Cyberarm. Weapon can be concealed. Requires a Cyberarm and takes up 2 Option Slots.

Title: Popup Melee Weapon
Description: Any Light, Medium, or Heavy Melee Weapon installed in a Cyberarm. Weapon can be concealed even if not normally concealable. Requires a Cyberarm and takes up 2 Option Slots.

Title: Popup Net Launcher
Description: Shoot nets from your arm like a superhero

Title: Popup Ranged Weapon
Description: Any One-Handed Ranged Weapon installed in a Cyberarm. Weapon can be concealed even if not normally concealable. Requires a Cyberarm and takes up 2 Option Slots.

Title: Popup Shotgun
Description: A Shotgun in your arm

Title: Psiberstuff Watch-Man
Description: A fully-functional Agent with a flip-up screen built into the cyberarm

Title: Gas Jet
Description: Aerosol gas launcher. Covers a large area with a chosen Street Drug or toxin. Requires a Cyberarm and takes 2 Option Slots.

Title: Personal Shredder
Description: Commercial grade cross cut shredder concealed within the cyberarm, complete with internal reservoir for storing shreds. Requires a Cyberarm.

Title: Quick Change Mount
Description: Allows user to remove or install a Cyberarm as an Action

Title: Blitzkrieg Arc-Thrower
Description: No hand but you can now throw lightning at multiple enemies at once.

Title: MicroWaldo
Description: A spider-like collection of probes turn your hand into a monster of surgical precision.

Title: Reinforced Cyberlimb Upgrade
Description: Say goodbye to breaking this limb

Title: Rippers
Description: Carbo-glass claws. Medium Melee Weapon. Can be concealed. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm.

Title: Scratchers
Description: Carbo-glass fingernails. Light Melee Weapon. Can be concealed. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm.

Title: Shoulder Cam
Description: Video camera mounted in shoulder. Can be concealed. Requires a Cyberarm and takes up 2 Option Slots.

Title: Slice 'N Dice
Description: Monofilament whip implanted in the thumb. Medium Melee Weapon. Can be concealed. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm.

Title: Sponsored Covering
Description: Covers the Cyberarm in an illustrated advertisement. Assuming the user remains in good standing with the sponsor and displays the arm uncovered for a percentage of the day, they receive 20eb on the first of each month. Sponsors have been known to repossess the entire arm if the wearer breaks the terms of their conditions. Requires a Cyberarm.

Title: Subdermal Grip
Description: Cyberarm Option. Neuralware Option. Subdermal plate under the palm allows user to make use of Smartguns. A cost-effective alternative to Interface Plugs. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm. Requires Neural Link and takes up a Neuralware Option Slot.

Title: Techscanner
Description: Techscanner installed in Cyberarm. Helps diagnose broken tech. +2 to multiple TECH-based Skills. Requires a Cyberarm and takes 2 Option Slots.

Title: Tool Hand
Description: Fingers contain screwdriver, wrench, small drill, and other tools. Can be installed as only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm.

Title: Wolvers
Description: Long claws extended from the knuckles. Heavy Melee Weapon. Can be concealed. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm.

Title: Cyberleg
Description: Replacement leg. Has 3 Option Slots. Comes installed with Standard Foot that doesn't cause Humanity Loss or take up an Option Slot. Most Cyberleg options must be paired (purchased twice and installed in two different Cyberlegs on a user. HL must be paid for each).

Title: Extra-Jointed Cyberlimb Upgrade
Description: Adds extra points of articulation. +2 bonus to Contortionist Skill Checks

Title: Grip Foot
Description: Traction enhanced. Negates movement penalty when climbing. Requires two Cyberlegs and must be paired.

Title: Jump Booster
Description: Hydraulics in legs. Negates movement penalty when jumping. Requires two Cyberlegs, takes up 2 Option Slots, and must be paired.

Title: Reinforced Cyberlimb Upgrade
Description: Say goodbye to breaking this limb

Title: Skate Foot
Description: Inline skates built into feet. Can be concealed. Increases movement by 6m/yds when using Run Action. Requires two Cyberlegs and must be paired.

Title: Talon Foot
Description: Blade mounted in foot. Light Melee Weapon. Can be concealed. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat leg.

Title: Web Foot
Description: Thin webbing between toes. Negates movement penalty when swimming. Requires two Cyberlegs and must be paired.

Title: Romanova Cyberlegs
Description: Comes in pairs. Comes with heels. The heels are weapons. You can poison them.

Title: Amplified Hearing
Description: +2 to Perception for Checks involving hearing. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Audio Recorder
Description: Records audio to Memory Chip or linked Agent. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Bug Detector
Description: Beeps when within 2m/yds of a listening device. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Cyberaudio Suite
Description: Has 3 Option Slots. Cannot install more than 1.

Title: Discount Cyberaudio Suite
Description: An inferior Cyberaudio Suite at an affordable price

Title: PiR2
Description: EBM’s version of the basic Internal Agent improves reliability without increasing the risk of migraines.

Title: Homing Tracer
Description: Can follow a linked tracer up to 1 mile away. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Internal Agent
Description: Fully functional Agent installed internally. Can be linked to a Cybereye with Chyron display. Otherwise, audio only. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Level Dampener
Description: User immune to effects caused by loud noises. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Radar Detector
Description: Beeps if active radar beam is within 100m/yd. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Radio Communicator
Description: User can communicate via radio. 1 mile range. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Radio Scanner / Music Player
Description: Can play music from Data Pool or Memory Chip or tune into radio broadcasts within 1 mile. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Scrambler / Descrambler
Description: Allows user to scramble outgoing communications and descramble incoming communications. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Voice Stress Analyser
Description: +2 to Human Perception and Interrogation Checks. Requires a Cyberaudio Suite.

Title: Anti-Dazzle
Description: User immune to effects caused by flashes of light. Requires two Cybereyes and must be paired.

Title: Chipware Compartment
Description: Compartment can conceal up to four pieces of Chipware without a Check. Chipware can be easily removed as an Action by spinning the eye in its socket. Requires a Cybereye and takes 3 Option Slots

Title: Chyron
Description: Projects subscreen into user's field of vision. Requires a Cybereye.

Title: Color Shift
Description: Unlimited color and pattern changes for the eye. Requires a Cybereye.

Title: Cybereye
Description: Artificial Eye. Each Cybereye has 3 Option Slots. Some options must be paired (purchased twice and installed in two different Cybereyes on a user. HL must be paid for each).

Title: Bug Eye
Description: An oversized Cybereye resembling the bulging eyeball of an insect. Contains 5 slots for Cybereye options

Title: Dartgun
Description: Single shot Dartgun Exotic Weapon concealed in eye. Requires a Cybereye and takes up 3 Option Slots.

Title: Hardened Cybereye Casing
Description: Protect your Cybereye against EMP effects

Title: Image Enhancer
Description: Adds +2 to Perception, Lip Reading, and Conceal/Reveal Object. Requires two Cybereyes and must be paired.

Title: MonoVision
Description: Doesn't let you shoot optic blasts. Does let you install Cybereye options without pairing.

Title: Low-Light / Infrared / UV
Description: User can ignore penalties due to darkness, smoke, fog, etc. Requires two Cybereyes and must be paired.

Title: MicroOptics
Description: Provides user with 400x magnification. Requires a Cybereye.

Title: MicroVideo
Description: Camera in eye. Records audio and video to Memory Chip or linked Agent. Requires a Cybereye and takes 2 option slots.

Title: Radiation Detector
Description: Radiation readings within 100m/yd displayed in form of blue glow. Requires a Cybereye.

Title: Sponsored Cybereye
Description: A cheap Cybereye with Chyron and pop-up ads

Title: Targeting Scope
Description: Adds +1 to Check when making Aimed Shot. Requires a Cybereye.

Title: TeleOptics
Description: Can see detail up to 800m/yd away. +1 to Aimed Shots against target 51m/yds or farther away. Requires a Cybereye.

Title: VIC Jammer
Description: Requires a Cybereye and takes 2 option slots. Does not need to be paired.

Title: Virtuality
Description: Projects cyberspace imagery over user's view of the world. Requires two Cybereyes and must be paired.

Title: Combat Tail
Description: User's spine is extended to connect the nerves to a weaponised tail module. Requires Neural Link.

Title: External Vidscreen
Description: A flexible rectangular Nu-Tek Touch TV panel approximately the dimensions of the Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook is installed subcutaneously, turning any desired part of the user's body into a screen that can be utilized by a linked Agent or Memory Chip inserted into a user's Chipware Socket.

Title: Hidden Holster
Description: Can store weapon capable of concealment inside body.

Title: OptiShield
Description: Retractable Anti-Dazzle Mirrorshades built into the brow which can be extended or retracted as an Action. While extended, the user is immune to blindness or other effects caused by dangerous flashes of light, like those of a flashbang.

Title: Skin Weave
Description: User's body and head armoured at SP7. Does not stack with worn Armor. Ablates. Recovers 1 SP per day of rest.

Title: Subdermal Armor
Description: User's body and head armoured at SP11. Does not stack with worn Armor. Ablates. Recovers 1 SP per day of rest.

Title: Subdermal Pocket
Description: 2 x 4 (5cm x 10cm) storage space just under the skin with RealSkinn zipper.

Title: Sycust FleshWeave
Description: Better Skinweave than anything else on the market.

Title: EMP Threading
Description: Thin silver lines that run in circuit-like patterns across the body.

Title: Heuristic Health Monitor
Description: Calculates the users vitals as a single statistic referred to as 'HP'.

Title: Kill Display
Description: Bright and bold letters illuminated from under the user's skin declares KILLS followed by a number. This count is self-reported using a linked Agent, and goes up to a maximum of 999. Counts as an installation of Light Tattoo fashionware.

Title: Turn-On-Show-Off Nails
Description: A full set of 10 programable lighted fingernails allow the user to bring the nail art of their dreams to life. Each purchase comes with a set of light pens for creating new nail art presets. Presets can also be downloaded from CitiNet using a linked Agent. Counts as an installation of Light Tattoo fashionware.

Title: Mood Eyes
Description: Colour changing lenses implanted into the users eye. Users eye colour changes based on the largest single characteristic of their current mood as interpreted from brain scans. Faking an emotion scan flawlessly enough to change your eye colour while wearing these is a DV 21 Acting Check. Can be deactivated by the user at any time without an Action. Requires Neural Link.

Title: Copernicus
Description: The ideal FBC body for deep-space exploration and construction.

Title: Aquarius
Description: The last word in exploration and life under the sea.

Title: Brimstone
Description: Created to defeat humankind’s greatest tool and enemy: fire!

Title: Dragoon
Description: A complete revision of the undeniably effective military FBC that won the 4th Corporate War.

Title: Eclipse
Description: Militech fully denies the existance[sic] of 'killer Borg ninjas.'

Title: Enforcer
Description: Militech understands what it takes to bring criminals to justice – it takes an Enforcer.

Title: Spyder 2.0
Description: The perfect espionage Borg!

Title: Sheol
Description: Designed to handle the most hazardous operation you can throw at it.

Title: Samson
Description: The toughest industrial Borg on the market. Just one can replace ten hardhats.

Title: Gemini
Description: All the benefits of being a Full Body Conversion, none of the social downside!

Title: Wiseman
Description: The holiday gift your Dweller deserves! Kills enemy Netrunners dead.

Title: Alpha Class
Description: An attractive yet affordable entry-level model.

Title: Kildare
Description: Trauma Team's secret weapon in their fight for the health and wellbeing of their patients.

Title: AudioVox
Description: Vocal synthesizer. User adds +2 to Acting and Play Instrument Skill when singing.

Title: AutoInjector
Description: Injects a dose of Drugs upon command or automatically due to preset condition.

Title: Contraceptive Implant
Description: Prevents undesired pregnancy.

Title: Cybersnake
Description: Esophagus mounted Very Heavy Melee Weapon. Can be concealed.

Title: Enhanced Antibodies
Description: After stabilization, user heals BODY x 2 for each day spent resting.

Title: Gills
Description: User can breathe underwater.

Title: Grafted Muscle and Bone Lace
Description: Increases BODY by 2. The increase changes HP, Wound Threshold, and Death Save. Cannot raise BODY above 10.

Title: Independent Air Supply
Description: Provides 30 minutes of oxygen. Takes 1 hour to refill from ambient atmosphere.

Title: Internal Body Cyberware Hardening Shielding
Description: Protect your Internal Body Cyberware against EMP effects.

Title: Nasal Filters
Description: User immune to effects of toxic gases, fumes, and similar dangers.

Title: NeuTongue
Description: Cybernetic tongue alters the user's sense of taste. Using a linked Agent, virtual seasoning can be added to food. Can be deactivated by the user at any time without an action, eliminating the user's sense of taste.

Title: RacerBracer
Description: Immunity to Whiplash Critical Injury.

Title: Radar / Sonar Implant
Description: Scans terrain within 50m/yds. Cannot scan through cover.

Title: Toxin Binders
Description: Adds +2 to Resist Torture/Drugs.

Title: Trauma Response Nanomatrix
Description: Restore all lost Skin Weave or Subdermal Armor SP once/day.

Title: Vampyres
Description: Excellent Quality Light Melee Weapon implanted in mouth. Can be concealed. User can add Poison or Biotoxin.

Title: Animal Behaviour Chip
Description: +4 to Acting Checks to impersonate an animal

Title: Braindance Recorder
Description: Records user's experiences to memory chip or external device. Requires Neural Link.

Title: Budget Chipware Socket
Description: A cheap Chipware Socket

Title: Chemical Analyser
Description: Chipware. Tests substance for precise chemical composition and compares to a database. Requires Chipware Socket.

Title: Chipware Socket
Description: A single socket installed in back of the neck. Required to use Chipware. Requires Neural Link.

Title: DeathTrance
Description: Appear dead without being dead. Might add a pale glow to your skin permanently.

Title: Explicit Memory Stimulator
Description: +2 to Concentration Checks made to remember information

Title: Interface Plugs
Description: Plugs in wrist or head that allow connection to machines. Requires Neural Link.

Title: Kerenzikov
Description: User adds +2 to Initiative. Only 1 piece of Speedware can be installed at a time. Requires Neural Link.

Title: Memory Chip
Description: Data storage. User's cyberware can store or access data on it.

Title: Neural Link
Description: Wired artificial nervous system. Required to use Neuralware and Subdermal Grip. Has 5 Option Slots.

Title: Olfactory Boost
Description: Chipware. User can use Tracking Skill to track via scent. Requires Chipware Socket.

Title: Pain Editor
Description: Chipware. User ignores penalties due to being seriously wounded. Requires Chipware Socket.

Title: PoserChip
Description: Don't just look like Elvis. Be Elvis. Or anyone else you desire to duplicate.

Title: MicroWaldo
Description: A spider-like collection of probes turn your hand into a monster of surgical precision.

Title: Reflex Co-Processor
Description: Dodge bullets without REF 8.

Title: Sandevistan
Description: When activated as an Action adds +3 to Initiative for one minute. Has 1 hour cool down period. Only 1 piece of Speedware can be installed at a time. Requires Neural Link.

Title: Skill Chip
Description: Chipware. User has specific Skill at Level 3 unless Skill is already 3+. Skill Chips for (x2) cost Skills cost more. Requires Chipware Socket.

Title: Subdermal Grip
Description: Cyberarm Option. Neuralware Option. Subdermal plate under the palm allows user to make use of Smartguns. A cost-effective alternative to Interface Plugs. Can be installed as the only piece of Cyberware in a meat arm. Requires Neural Link and takes up a Neuralware Option Slot.

Title: Tactile Boost
Description: Chipware. User can detect motion within 20m/yd by placing hand on surface. Requires Chipware Socket.
